body:
The story's pretty much understandable even without the text, but... 

Summary: Tomoya confesses to Kato; Eriri overhears this and loses her shit. She doesn't come to school and nobody hears a thing about her for a while. Then out of the blue, Eriri mails Tomoya, saying she wants to meet with him. And so Tomoya goes to Eriri's house and he asks himself how long has it been ever since he came to her house. He finds a manga that Eriri drew, where she is the one that Tomoya loves; the catch is, even though the girl in the drawing looks like Eriri, her lines and behavior are exactly like Kato's and not hers. Tomoya has a WTF moment and then the stabbing happens. In case you didn't notice, Eriri is wearing the same clothes as Kato. Tomoya says so himself. Eriri is batshit insane and believes herself to be Tomoya's girlfriend. She says something like taking care of her boyfriend's "needs" is a girlfriend's duty. Then Tomoya says that there is something he wants to tell her; Eriri is losing h
Wow Eriri changed a lot i guess..
I like this series and really want to read the novel but I can't find it anywhere in English. ..
Tomoya confessing to Megumi just like in the novel. That's what Eriri get for leaving Tomoya's circle. Now I want an Utaha yandere version of this.
